topic.topicTitle: Front of Class Teaching with the Book
topic.topicDialog:
The Kerboodle Books are a useful tool for Front of Class teaching.

This tutorial will show you some of the options available.

step.stepTextTip:
Search: Use the search tool to quickly find all of the pages in the book that contain a certain word.

Click on the Search button in the main toolbar.

Enter your search term and click Search.

The results will appear below as book pages, just click on the image of the page to launch it. Your search term will then be highlighted on the page.

Bookmarks: You can bookmark pages to use in future lessons and planning.

Click on the Bookmark button in the main toolbar.
Enter a name for your bookmark and click Add a bookmark.

Your bookmarks will then appear as a list any time you click on the Bookmark button in the toolbar.

To access your bookmarks, just click on the title and then the Go to the selected bookmark button.

Zoom Tools: There are several view and zoom tools available but the Zoom to Explain tool is ideal for front of class teaching.

Click on the Zoom to Explain option in the toolbar.
Use your cursor to select the area of the page that you would like enlarged.
This selection will then appear full screen to present to your class.
